articles.title: Kim Yong Chun Meets Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Chun Meets Chinese Delegation
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Thursday met and had a talk with the delegation of veteran fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers led by Wang Hai, former commander of the Air Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the entry of the CPV into the Korean front.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese Figure
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese Figure
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Ji Bingxuan, secretary of the Heilongjiang Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.
					 Ji Bingxuan handed it to Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, who is leading the friendly delegation of the WPK on a visit to China on Wednesday.

articles.title: CPLA Art Troupe Gives Its Premiere
articles.content:
CPLA Art Troupe Gives Its Premiere
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The Art Troupe of the Chinese People's Liberation Army gave its premiere at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday. It is on a performance tour on the occasion of the diamond jubilee of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front. 
					 Among the audience were general officers and other officers of the Korean People's Army, creators and artistes of army art organizations, the head of the Chinese art troupe and its leading members. 
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including band music "Song of the Korean People's Army" and serial songs devoted to the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean Front. 
					
					 The Chinese artistes impressively presented with perfect ensemble and rich voice and refined rendition numbers representing the invincible might of the armies of the two countries and the heroic struggle of the fighters of the CPV in which they set a noble example of internationalism. 
					
					 The artistes imbued audience with profound reference for the peerlessly great persons by singing well such Korean songs as female solos "Kimjongilia" and "We Sing of Immense Happiness".
					
					 The immortal revolutionary paeans "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il" that resounded forth in the theatre imbued the audience with the immense national pride and honor of successfully implementing the cause of building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il holding President Kim Il Sung as eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience for its rich ideological contents and high artistry.
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition Opens to Mark Entry of CPV into Korean Front
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition Opens to Mark Entry of CPV into Korean Front
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition was opened at the Pyongyang Center for Cultural Exchange with Foreign Countries on Thursday to mark the 60th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front.
					 Displayed in the venue of the opening ceremony are photos dealing with the activities conducted by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with revolutionaries of the elder generation of China including Chairman Mao Zedong and Hu Jintao for the development of the friendly relations between the two countries and photos showing the history of the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 Present there were Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health who doubles as chairman of the Central Committee of the  DPRK-China Friendship Association, Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned, working people in the city, Ambassador Liu Hongcai and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremony.
					
					 Choe Chang Sik said that the Chinese party and government made contributions to the victory in the war by assisting the Korean people in their heroic struggle, paying high tribute to the fallen fighters of the CPV who unhesitatingly dedicated youth and lives.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the exhibition would contribute to boosting the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Liu Hongcai said that resisting America and aiding Korea recorded a shining page in the world history of the war against aggression, adding that the Sino-DPRK friendship sealed in blood is growing stronger under the care of the leaders of the two countries.
					
					 He said that the Chinese people would together with the Korean comrades carve out the beautiful future of the traditional Sino-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation provided by the revolutionaries of the elder generation.
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony the participants looked round the photos on display.

articles.title: Chinese Film Week Opens to Mark Entry of CPV into Korean Front
articles.content:
Chinese Film Week Opens to Mark Entry of CPV into Korean Front
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The Chinese film week was opened with due ceremony at Taedongmun Cinema on Thursday to mark the 60th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front.
					 Present there were Hong Kwang Sun, chairman of the State Film Commission, officials concerned, creators and artistes in the field of film, Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy and Chinese staying here.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremony.
					
					 Hong referred to the fact that fighters of the CPV under the banner of the resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland and displayed the spirit of internationalism in the battles against the enemy common to the DPRK and China, adding that the traditional DPRK-China friendship relations provided by President Kim Il Sung together with the revolutionaries of the elder generation of China have been consolidated and developed under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 Hong expressed belief that the creators and artistes in the field of film of the two countries would conduct positive exchanges to make contribution to developing the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 Liu Hongcai recalled that 60 years ago the excellent sons and daughters of China and volunteered to the Korean front and waged bloody battles together with the Korean people.
					
					 He said that they would strengthen cooperation in different fields including the film art to further boost the China-DPRK friendship together with comrades of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants watched the Chinese feature film "Shangganling".

articles.title: Wreath Laid before Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong
articles.content:
Wreath Laid before Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The delegation of veteran fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers led by Wang Hai, former commander of the Air Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the entry of the CPV into the Korean front laid a wreath before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Thursday.
					 The members of the delegation laid a wreath before the cemetery and observed a moment's silence in memory of the revolutionary martyrs who laid down their lives for the liberation and prosperity of the country and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Then they laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: Friendship Forged in Blood in Anti-US War
articles.content:
Friendship Forged in Blood in Anti-US War
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Sixty years has elapsed since the armies and peoples of Korea and China began fighting on one side against the imperialist allied forces' invasion.
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953), the Chinese Party and Government adopted a crucial decision on resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland and sent volunteers to the Korean War on October 25, Juche 39 (1950) when the Korean people were waging a life-and-death struggle against the invaders.
					
					 Fully displayed in the war was the Chinese people's obligation to the Korean revolutionaries and people who, under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, had rendered sincere material and mental assistance to the Chinese people in their arduous anti-Japanese war and homeland liberation war.
					
					 The Chinese People's Volunteers, together with Korean People's Army, successfully waged many battles to contribute to winning the war. Among the battles are those in Unsan and Hyon-ri areas, on River Chongchon, Lake Jangjin and River Kumsong in Kimhwa area and in Mt. Maryang, Hill Sanggam and Mt. Rodok.
					
					 Pilots, anti-aircraft artillerymen, military engineers and other Chinese servicepersons fought valiantly in the war, fully discharging their internationalist mission.
					
					 The DPRK Government, in order to appreciate their heroic services and record them in the history of DPRK-China friendship, awarded DPRK orders and medals to 661,736 volunteers. Of them twelve were honored with the title of Hero of Republic and 226 with Order of the National Flag 1st Class.  
					
					 All the volunteers not only displayed an unexampled spirit of self-sacrifice and heroism in the war against the aggressors but promoted friendly relations with the Korean people.
					
					 They protected Korean people's lives and properties at the risk of danger, helped peasants in their tilling, sowing and harvesting and restored damaged reservoirs, dikes, roads and bridges. One of them saved a Korean boy from an air hole at the cost of his life.
					
					 After the ceasefire, the Chinese volunteers, together with the Korean People's Army, did their utmost to frustrate the enemy's provocation moves and promote a peaceful reunification of Korea. They also devotedly helped the Korean people in their rehabilitation and construction under the slogan "Let Each of Us Do More Things Good for the Korean People!" 
					
					 Through the war, the revolutionaries and peoples of the DPRK and China further developed bilateral friendship and unity.
					
					 Now the DPRK-China friendship, which is on a high level under deep concern of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the Chinese leadership of new generation, will as ever develop along with the Friendship Tower, fully demonstrating its vitality.

articles.title: Meeting Held to Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Meeting Held to Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday to mark the 20th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Improving and Strengthening Financial and Banking Work" and the 40th anniversary of his policy of daily production and financial reviews.
					 Present there were Premier of the Cabinet Choe Yong Rim, Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Hong Sok Hyong and other officials. 
					
					 Vice-Premier and concurrently Minister of Finance Pak Su Gil made a report there.
					
					 He recalled that Kim Jong Il made public the work in September Juche 79 (1990), clarifying the essential characteristics of finance under socialism and the principle of its management and giving perfect answers to the issues of correctly shaping a state budget and thoroughly implementing it, improving the financial management at industrial establishments, consolidating the currency circulation in the country and strengthening the financial review and control, etc.
					
					 The reporter pointed to the fact that Kim Jong Il set forth the unique policy of daily production and financial reviews in June Juche 59 (1970), thus further developing the socialist method of economic management.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has wisely led the work to make sure that the finance under socialism served the purpose of meeting the demand of popular masses for independence and ensuring their creative life, thus consolidating the financial foundation of the country, the reporter noted, and continued:
					
					 Under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il the financial and banking work in the DPRK creditably performed its mission and role as a Juche-oriented and popular one, bringing about big progress in the overall financial management.
					
					 The reporter called on the officials in the field of finance and banking to thoroughly carry out the party's financial policy and put the accounting on a higher IT basis.

articles.title: Symposium on Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Held
articles.content:
Symposium on Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Held
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- A symposium of Juche-oriented idea of literature and art on the light comedy "Echo of Mountain", winner of Kim Il Sung prize, took place on Thursday. 
					 Present there were Kim Pyong Hun, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of the Unions of Literature and Arts of Korea, officials concerned, creators, artistes, journalists and editors in the fields of dramatic art and media and teachers, researchers and students of universities. 
					
					 The floor was taken by Prof. and Dr. Ko Chol Hun, director of the Juche Literature Institute of the Academy of Social Science of the DPRK, Prof. Song Yong Hun, researcher at Pyongyang University of Dramatic and Cinematic Arts, and others. They said that the light comedy electrified all the servicepersons and people in their advance for effecting a great surge, making its strong spirit sweep throughout the country.
					
					 Noting that the light comedy has displayed its great vitality for nearly five decades for its great influence and high cognitional and instructive value, they stressed that it is a masterpiece of the era as it teaches immutable truth of life and a work listed as national treasure as it serves as a good textbook in the ideological education of the servicepersons and people in the DPRK.
					
					 It is one of the achievements gained by the light comedy that it makes a truthful and optimistic representation of collectivism, an engine for the grand Chollima march, optimism about future and faith in the victory of socialism, they pointed out, and continued:  
					
					 The artistes succeeded in making a novel and peculiar representation by fully reflecting the reality in that period through a good combination of merry laughs and witty and nimble humors. 
					
					 It is thanks to the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il that the "echo of mountain" in the era of Chollima which rocked the whole country in the 1960s has reechoed through the whole country as an echo for a great surge in the drive for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Cuban Ministry of Foreign Affairs led by Vice-Minister Marcos Fermin Rodriguez Costa visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill Thursday to pay homage to him.
					 The members of the delegation laid a bouquet before the statue before making bows to him in profound reverence.
					
					 The delegation arrived here on Thursday .

articles.title: Gift from Vietnamese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Vietnamese Delegation
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of the Institute for Northeast Asian Studies of the Academy of Social Sciences of Vietnam.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned by head of the delegation Nguyen Xuan Thang, vice-president of the academy who doubles as director of the institute, on Oct. 20.

articles.title: Gift from Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Russian Delegation
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of the Institute of the Far East of the Russian Academy of Sciences.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Wednesday by Director Mikhail Tsitarenko who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Recuperation and Relaxation System
articles.content:
Recuperation and Relaxation System
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The working people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea enjoy rest at sanatoria and holiday homes at state expense.
					 After the liberation of the country from the Japanese colonial rule, President Kim Il Sung took measures to turn villas and pleasure resorts belonging to Japanese imperialists, landlords and capitalists into rest centers for the working people and build new holiday homes in beauty spots, hot-spring spots and mineral resorts.
					
					 Under his care night rest homes were built at industrial establishments and rest centers in frontline areas for servicepersons during the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953). In the postwar period, destroyed rest homes were reconstructed and new ones built. He gave field guidance to many rest homes throughout the country.
					
					 True to the intention of the President, General Secretary Kim Jong Il also visited rest homes, paying deep concern to the health and rest of the working people.
					
					 Such famous mountains as Kumgang, Myohyang and Chilbo, and other beauty spots with hot spring and mineral water have holiday homes to accommodate a large number of working people.
					
					 Now available in the country are a 15-day after-work rest system, a 30-day rest system and 5-day and 15-day recreation systems.
					
					 The state pays for the management of all the sanatoria and holiday homes and for the vacationers' going there and back.

articles.title: Mother-of-pearl Workmanship
articles.content:
Mother-of-pearl Workmanship 
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Korea has a long history of mother-of-pearl workmanship.
					 Especially, large flower vases "Jong Il Peak Aflamed with Joy" and "Mt. Paektu Enveloped in Glee" are typical of Korean mother-of-pearl works. The vases with white mother-of-pearls on the black ground are considered to be national assets of great artistic value.
					
					 They were inlaid with tens of thousands of abalone mother-of-pearl pieces to represent tens of cranes and beautiful decorations.
					
					 Another mother-of-pearl work "Secret Camp on Mt. Paektu" is highly appreciated for its splendid and delicate feature.
					
					  "Mandarin Duck", "Wild Geese over Pidan Island" and "Eight Fairies on Mt. Kumgang" are masterpieces fully preserving the Juche character and nationality and demonstrating the development of the country's craftwork.
					
					 All of them were created by Han Jong Chol, head of the Craftwork Creative Group of the Mansudae Art Studio who was crowned with the title of People's Artist. 
					
					 Han joined the art studio in Juche 72 (1983) after graduating from Pyongyang University of Fine Arts.

articles.title: Functions Held to Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection
articles.content:
Functions Held to Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks and lectures took place in Germany, Iran and Tanzania from October 2 to 9 to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Germany at the round-table talks praised the leadership role of the WPK in the revolution and construction. He reiterated the will to invariably support the cause of the WPK working hard to attain the grandiose goal to build an economic power while protecting the sovereignty of the country and dignity of its people under the banner of Songun at a time when the imperialists' high-handed practices are becoming ever-more undisguised. 
					
					 The secretary general of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran said in a lecture that the reelection of Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK was an expression of the absolute support and trust of the members of the WPK and the Korean people in him. 
					
					 The chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups said in a lecture that the WPK has led the Korean people along the road of victory and glory as an invincible party shining with the august name of President Kim Il Sung and wisely led by Kim Jong Il, performing great exploits for the country and history. He expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve bigger successes in the building of a thriving nation under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events in Germany and Tanzania.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy in Kuala Lumpur
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy in Kuala Lumpur
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were sent to the DPRK embassy in Kuala Lumpur by the United Malays National Organization of Malaysia, the Malaysian People's Movement, the Malaysian Chinese Association, National Youth, the Yang Tzi Cruise & Tour SDN. BHD., the Dickson Wong SDN. BHD., the M.K.P. Company, the Zawala Company, the Ino-wangsa Oil & Sats Sdn, Bhd, the Dombo Enterprise Company, the Johnson Nicholson Company, the and the Summit Agences SDN. BHD., etc. on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The baskets were laid before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Held
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Held 
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK book, photo and handcraft exhibitions were held in Russia, Peru and Uganda from October 7 to 17 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea, the 84th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo. 
					 On display in their venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos on their exploits and books and photos introducing the history of the WPK and Songun Korea and handcrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremonies. 
					
					 The director of the Bureau for Culture of the Murom City Administration of Vladimir Region of Russia said that there are now many parties in the world, but none of them is confidently advancing along the road of victory united close around its leader as the WPK. He hoped that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in socialist construction true to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Il in the future, too.
					
					 A district governor in Lima City of Peru said that he was very pleased to host a DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibition, hoping that the exhibition would offer an opportunity to make the ties between the peoples of the two countries closer.

articles.title: Work of Kim Il Sung Published in Italy
articles.content:
Work of Kim Il Sung Published in Italy 
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Historical Experience of Building the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in booklet by the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Songun Idea in Fermo of Italy on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the WPK. 
					 The work, published on May 31, Juche 75 (1986), deals with the struggle of the Korean communists for founding the party, the historic experience gained in the construction of the WPK, etc.

articles.title: Inquebrantable amistad combativa entre Corea y China
articles.content:
Inquebrantable amistad combativa entre Corea y China
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ATCC) -- Ya transcurrieron 60 anos desde que los ejercitos y pueblos de Corea y China lucharon en la misma trinchera contra la invasion armada de las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas.
					  Durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (de junio de 1950 a julio de 1953), el partido y el gobierno de China tomaron la importante decision de "resistir a los yanquis, ayudar a Corea, y defender el hogar y el pais propios".
					
					　El 25 de octubre del 39 (1950) de la Era Juche justamente cuando el pueblo coreano combatia de vida o muerte contra la coalicion imperialista para defender las conquistas de la revolucion, enviaron al frente coreano el cuerpo de voluntarios organizado con los hijos excelentes de la nacion china.
					
					  En los dias de la guerra coreana, fue manifestada plenamente la gratitud del pueblo chino hacia los revolucionarios y habitantes coreanos quienes bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, ayudaron con sangre y en lo material y espiritual la revolucion china durante la ardua guerra antijaponesa y la de liberacion nacional.
					
					  Los miembros del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino contribuyeron mucho a la victoria de la guerra participando junto con los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea en numerosos combates, incluyendo los entablados en la zona de Unsan, en la orilla del rio Chongchon y del lago Jangjin, la zona de Hyon-ri, el ataque al monte Maryang, la defensa del pico Sanggam, el rescate del monte Rodok y el contragolpe en las inmediaciones del rio Kumsong de la zona de Kimhwa.
					
					  Por otra parte, cumplieron tambien con valentia su mision internacionalista los combatientes de distintos tipos de ejercito y especialidades militares, incluyendo los pilotos, artilleros antiaereos y zapadores.
					
					  Segun la medida tomada por el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para premiar y hacer brillar eternamente en la historia de la amistad Corea-China los meritos heroicos del cuerpo de voluntarios chinos, 661 mil 736 oficiales y soldados del mismo recibieron ordenes y medallas de la RPDC, incluyendo 12 heroes de la Republica y 226 condecorados con la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase.
					
					  Todos los oficiales y soldados del cuerpo chino batallaron con sacrificio y heroismo contra los agresores por una parte y por la otra, estrecharon las relaciones fraternales con el pueblo coreano.
					
					  Numerosos combatientes chinos defendieron a riesgo de vida la vida y bienes del pueblo coreano y le ayudaron en la arada, la siembra y la cosecha y en la reconstruccion de embalses, diques, carreteras y puentes.
					
					  Un martir chino salvo ofrendando su vida a un nino coreano que habia caido en el hueco abierto en la superficie del rio helado.
					
					  Aun despues del cese de fuego, el cuerpo chino realizo todos los esfuerzos posibles por promover la reunificacion pacifica de Corea frustrando junto con el Ejercito Popular de Corea las provocaciones de los enemigos.
					
					　Igualmente, ayudo abnegadamente la reconstruccion posbelica del pueblo coreano bajo la consigna "!Cada persona debe hacer mas favores al pueblo coreano!".
					
					  Librando juntos las batallas de sangre y fuego contra los agresores imperialistas, los revolucionarios y pueblos de ambos paises forjaron mas la amistad y la solidaridad.
					
					  La amistad Corea-China, que llego hoy a la etapa mas alta bajo la atencion muy profunda del Dirigente   Kim Jong Il y el colectivo directivo de nueva generacion de China, seguira fortaleciendose y desarrollandose siempre teniendo su simbolo en el Monumento a la Amistad construido en esta capital.

articles.title: Veteranos chinos depositan ofrenda floral en el cementerio de martires
articles.content:
Veteranos chinos depositan ofrenda floral en el cementerio de martires 
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 60o aniversario de la participacion del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino en el frente coreano, la delegacion de veteranos chinos encabezada por el ex comandante de la fuerza aerea del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China, Wang Hai, de visita en Corea, deposito el dia 21 una ofrenda floral en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el monte Taesong. 
					  Los huespedes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires revolucionarios que lucharon dedicando toda su vida por la liberacion y la prosperidad de la patria y por el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					  Acto seguido, colocaron ramos de flores ante el busto de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: Inaugurada fotoexhibicion por la participacion china en frente coreano
articles.content:
Inaugurada fotoexhibicion por la participacion china en frente coreano
 Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 21 en el Centro de Intercambio Cultural con el Extranjero de Pyongyang la exposicion fotografica por el 60o aniversario de la participacion del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino en el frente coreano.
					  En la ocasion fueron exhibidas las fotos alusivas a las actividades del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizadas junto con los revolucionarios de la veterana generacion de China, incluyendo el Presidente Mao Zedong, y el respetado camarada Hu Jintao por el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad Corea-China y a la historia de las mismas.
					
					  En el acto participaron el ministro de Salud Publica y presidente del CC de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-China, Choe Chang Sik, el vicepresidente del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Jon Yong Jin, los funcionarios interesados, los trabajadores capitalinos, el embajador Liu Hongcai y otros miembros de la embajada china en Corea.
					
					  Ante todo, hubo discursos.
					
					  Choe Chang Sik senalo que el partido y el gobierno de China contribuyeron a la victoria de la guerra ayudando la lucha heroica del pueblo coreano y rindio el sublime homenaje a los martires del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino quienes ofrendaron su juventud y vida.
					
					  Expreso la conviccion de que esta galeria fotografica contribuira a fortalecer mas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los pueblos de dos paises.
					
					  Liu Hongcai apunto que la ayuda de China a Corea en la lucha por resistir a los imperialistas norteamericanos escribio una pagina brillante en la historia mundial de las guerras contra la agresion y destaco que se fortalece y se desarrolla la amistad China-Corea establecida con sangre bajo la atencion de los dirigentes de dos paises.
					
					  Nos esforzaremos junto con los camaradas coreanos por forjar el hermoso futuro de las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion China-Corea preparadas por los revolucionarios de veterana generacion de los dos paises, concluyo.
					
					  Terminado el acto inaugural, los participantes pasaron revista a las fotos exhibidas.

articles.title: Delegacion cubana rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Delegacion cubana rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung 
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ATCC) -- La delegacion del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Cuba encabezada por el vicecanciller Marcos Fermin Rodriguez Costa rindio homenaje el dia 21 al Presidente Kim Il Sung tras depositar un ramo de flores ante su estatua de bronce erguida en la capitalina colina Mansu.
					　La delegacion arribo hoy a Pyongyang.
